title: Retirement Planning: How Much Do You Need?
excerpt: Calculate your retirement needs and create a plan to build long-term wealth.
editorial_summary: This retirement planning guide helps readers calculate how much they need to save for retirement, understand different retirement account types (401k, IRA, Roth), and create a long-term savings strategy. It covers the power of compound interest, employer matching, tax advantages, and how to maximize retirement contributions. Includes retirement calculators and age-based savings benchmarks.
